page.title: 10LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content:
An Annual Raft Race There are not very many leisure activities which take place in our small area but one which starts here is the annual raft race which is held in midsummer. It starts at the caravan site, Shoremills and ends at the little fishing village of Cromarty. Rafts come from all over the Highlands to join in the fun. The course is about two miles long and the rafts have to go twice. There are quite a lot of people who come to spectate and cheer on their raft. One of the rafts come from the local smiddy which is near our school. They call the raft the "Black Pig" and that is the one we cheer on, although it does not often win.
